name: Arduinorceyes
body:
Control scripts and simple library for receiving pulses from an RC Remote 
and controlling the eyes of a Halloween decoration. 

**Note:** Make sure to place the PWMReceiver folder 
inside the Libraries folder of your Arduino 
installation.

Pictures: [Link](https://www.flickr.com/photos/codeminion/sets/72157637118421744/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
